name: Lash Out
description: You lash out to vent your frustration toward the target. Make a melee attack, dealing 1d12 + MOVE dark damage on a hit.

If you are suffering from a non-volatile status condition, or any of your AC, STR, DEX, CON, INT, WIS, or CHA is currently lowered, then you make the attack with advantage and deal an additional MOVE dark damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
